social_posts.post_text:
One of the best meals of 2022: Anniversary Dinner with @twravenel at @thegrocerychs 👩🏻‍❤️‍💋‍👨🏽

1. Head on Shrimp

2. Chicken Agnolotti ~ turnips, field peas, kale, Parmesan 

3. Wreckfish ~ sunchoke purée 

4. Fried Oysters ~ deviled egg sauce, bread & butter pickles

5. Cabbage Gratin

6. Lovebirds

7. Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie, Churros ~ caramel, chocolate, and vanilla sauce
Never not hungry for @lewisbarbecuechs

Celebrated my birthday this weekend at the newly reopened @charleston_grill 🥳🍾 The renovated dining room is absolutely stunning. The menu is updated but not radically different (a good thing in my book!) The dishes we tasted were outstanding, and the service is still exceptional. Thank you @twravenel for an extra special night!

Had a wonderful dinner Sunday at newly opened @southboundchs on Cannon St! The space is gorg with great outdoor seating options. And I absolutely love that the dishes are prepared over a wood fired grill. The photos are of some of my favorites from our night: the Australian Lamb Rack, Golden Tilefish Picatta, and S’mores for dessert 🔥

What a fabulous Grand Opening Celebration for @sorelle_chs last night! The restaurant is an absolute stunner and features an expansive bar, wine room, grab-and-go mercato, pizza & pasta counter, and formal dining room. The Truffle Risotto was as insanely delicious as it looks, as were all the things I ate and drank 🍾🍊🍕🍷🍝 🍧 I can’t wait to go back for dinner next week!

Last month I went to @TempestCharleston for their first Tasting on the Quarter Deck, an immersive culinary experience with Bravo Top Chef Alum, @ChefJamieLynch. What an incredible night! Tasting on the Quarter Deck features a seafood-forward tasting menu of 7-10 dishes served over 5 courses. Thoughtfully curated beverage pairings are offered with each course. The full menu isn’t revealed until the night of the event, which makes for a fun surprise! I always love dining at Tempest, and this was such a fun and unique experience. Bravo, Chef Jamie! (See what I did there?! 😂) The next Tasting on the Quarter Deck is Tuesday, April 4. Snag a reservation on OpenTable or through the link in my bio 🦪🥂🐠🥩🥃🍧
Hands down one of the best brunches in town 😍 @theobstinatedaughter @palmettofoodie @judysoltis @jacques_larson

This is your sign to go get the Soft Shell Crab Trio at @thegrocerychs while you still can:

🦀 Old School ~ sautéed with lemon butter and capers 

🦀 Old South ~ cornmeal battered and deep fried with remoulade

🦀 Old World ~ wood fire roasted with salsa verde

10/10 recommend lunch and frozen cocktails on the patio of @thebountybar with your besties 🍹🌴💃🏻

1. Double Patty Melt
2. Grape vodka slushy + Citrus rum slushy
3. Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich 
4. Shrimp Po Boy
5. Fish Sandwich

It’s opening weekend for @maamsaabchs! (Fun fact: Ma’am Saab means Boss Lady, and Chef/Owner Maryam Ghaznavi is just that 💃🏻) I love the exotic, vibrant decor of the restaurant and the menu of Pakistani comfort dishes. The cocktails can be made with alcohol or CBD, which is really fun and different. The can’t-miss dish here is the Butter Chicken. Absolutely delicious!

Yesterday’s lunch date at @Bar167_Charleston:

🦀 Blue Crab Claws ~ shallot vinaigrette, brown butter aioli

🍹Fulton Street Ricky ~ gin, mint, cucumber, lime, ginger

🍸 Fire in the Garden ~ green chile vodka, hibiscus, rose

🍄 Funghi Fritti ~ crispy maitake, pistachio puree, summer truffle honey

🥖Jumbo Lump Crab Roll ~ green garlic aioli, cucumber, horseradish, Aleppo

All delicious as always!

••• CONTEST CLOSED••• 🍕BAR PIZZA GIVEAWAY 🍕 We’re giving two lucky winners a $100 gift card to @eatbarpizza in Mt. Pleasant! This newly opened, family friendly restaurant has a fun arcade room and pool table along with plenty of outdoor space. The menu features delicious wood-fired pizzas, pastas, and milkshakes. When you go, try one of Bar Pizza’s cocktails on tap, and don’t skip the Rigatoni Bolognese (you can thank me later!) 😉

To enter to win one of the $100 gift cards:

1. Be sure you are following @eatbarpizza and @charlestonfoodiebabe

2. Like this reel and tag a friend

Contest closes Friday, June 16. Good luck!!!
I 🫶 weekend lunches at @RanchoLewis! Pro-tip: after lunch, stop by neighboring @Coop_FroseAndEatery Outpost for to-go frosés to take to the pool/beach/backyard! 🌮🍧☀️

The most fun way to experience the live-fire cooking at @SouthboundChs is to book a seat at the Chef’s Counter 👨🏼‍🍳🔥 Settle in by the oak-fired hearth and watch the magic happen! Before ordering, you can sneak a peek at the evening’s menu offerings, which change daily. The Spanish Octopus, Pork Belly, and Blackened Red Drum were all fantastic, but the Dry Aged NY Strip stole the show this visit. Dessert was Key Lime Posset and the BEST Banana Pudding (this is a bold statement, and I stand by it) paired with one of my favorite cocktails in town, Sand in Your Kilt, a scotch-forward drink with a tiki twist. @SouthboundChs offers three nightly seatings at the Chef’s Counter at 5pm, 7pm, and 9pm. Definitely add this unique and delicious experience to your list!

✨Brunch at @Brasserie_La_Banque✨ Not only is the food amazing, but the service is excellent, and the restaurant is absolutely stunning. Highly recommend! Dishes featured in this post:

Plateau De La Banque ~ 6 oysters on the half shell, 1/2lb shrimp, clams, crab ravigote, sesame crackers

Omlette ~ gruyere, home fries, salade verte

Quiche Lorraine ~ lardons, spinach, gruyere, pistou, salade verte

Brioche French Toast ~ berry compote, crème anglaise

I have been recommending @ThreeSirensChs in Park Circle since the first time I went, but if you were needing a reminder to check them out for yourself, consider this your sign! The quality and execution of the dishes are consistently outstanding, and the service is fab. I leave so happy anytime I go! 🧜🏼‍♀️🧜🏼‍♀️🧜🏼‍♀️

Had a blast at Tempest's 3 Year Anniversary Dinner last night 🥂🌹If you ever have the opportunity to go to the restaurant on a night when they have prepared a chef’s tasting menu, DO IT! @ChefJamieLynch and @ChefAdamHodgson knock it out of the park every time. Last night’s 5-course menu was creative, fun, and absolutely delicious (details below.) Swipe to the last photo for a glimpse of when the last wine pairing hits 🤣

🦪 Roasted Lowcountry Cup ~ Creamed kale, crispy allium, oyster foam

🐟 SC Flounder Crudo ~ Popcorn mousse, huckleberry, corn vinaigrette, puffed sorghum 

🦀 Crab Mousse ~ Asparagus purée, mussels, potato galette

🐠 Sourdough Seared Mero Seabass ~ Local pepper basquaise, heirloom tomato, saffron

🍨 Peitit Pierres ~ Chocolate caramel stones, matcha crumble, calamansi sauce

Cheers to 3 years, @TempestCharleston!

The Tasting Menu Experience at @HoneysuckleRoseChs:
✨ 8 Courses
✨ Wine Pairings
✨ Rotating Menu
✨ 2.5 - 3 Hours
✨ Interactive
✨ Individually Tailored
✨ $250 Per Person

I absolutely love this concept, and the execution at Honeysuckle Rose was phenomenal. The space is cozy and intimate, the service staff is welcoming and knowledgeable, and the chefs are creative and fun. The food was incredible as were the wine pairings, and I love how the team guides you through each course. Scroll through the photos for some of my favorite dishes and scenes from the chef’s counter 🤩
Very into this breakfast 🥪 from @OddDuckMarket in Park Circle: prosciutto, egg, arugula, aged white cheddar, Calabrian chili mayo on focaccia

An ode to the fabulous food and patio vibes at The Bower at Edmund’s Oast + a compelling case for using a fork and knife to eat the Spicy Fried Shrimp Po Boy (scroll to the end 🤣)

P.S. Starting a petition to request @edmundsoast *pretty please* bring back the curly fries

Welcome to The Den, a new secret hideaway inside Frannie & The Fox at Hotel Emeline. This gorgeous bar is tucked in the back of the restaurant and features creative cocktails, bubbles, caviar service, and small plates.  I loved the Blue Crab Fritters, Confit Potatoes, Martini Service and Caviar Bumps (obvs)! Looking forward to going back and trying more menu items🍸🥂✨

———

#explorecharleston #chstoday #discoversc #eaterchs #southerncharm #foodandwine #martiniservice #caviar

These are a few of my favorite things 🎃☕️🍂 currently on the menu @viciousbiscuits 

———

#explorecharleston #chstoday #charleston #chucktown #visitsc #chseats #discoversc #eaterchs

My only regret is not saving room for dessert 💁🏻‍♀️ @indacochs

🍝 Creste Di Gallo ~ CAB beef bolognese, San Marzano DOP, parmesan, burrata

🍕 Fig Pizza ~ gorgonzola, mozzarella, arugula, balsamic, parmesan + prosciutto di parma

🥬 Charred Greens ~ green garlic salsa verde, lemon

🍝 Cappelletti in Brodo ~ braised rabbit, ricotta, lemon, aged balsamic, pickled shallot, chive oil

———

#explorecharleston #chseats #discoversc #eaterchs #chstoday

Came for the “Night Like This” cocktail benefitting @payitforwardchs, stayed for the Chengdu-style Sweet & Sour Pork 🍹🥡

Kwei Fei is one of 16 Charleston restaurants participating in Pay It Forward Charleston’s Brighter Days Ahead campaign. Through Sunday, October 29, each participating restaurant is presenting a special @highwirechs Hat Trick Botanical Gin cocktail, with proceeds from the drink donated to Pay It Forward Charleston’s Emergency Relief Fund. The fund supports people in the food and beverage industry facing unforeseen financial hardship. Other participants include @basic_kitchen, @brasserie_la_banque, @eatatfig, @fleetlanding, @herdprovisionschs, @indacochs, @dineatlenoir, @martinsbbqsc, @mayarestaurantchs, @okucharleston, @sharehousechs, @eatdrinkbodega, @gin_joint, @thekingstide, @eattheordinary, @uptownsocialchs. Go visit and have a great cocktail for a great cause!

______

#explorecharleston #chseats #chstoday #payitforward #brighterdays #eaterchs #discoversc

Weekend getaway @BeachHouseHHI 🍹🌴🎶🎸 We had such a fun trip full of food, drinks, live music, sand and sun! First up was @RockNRibsHHI Grand Tasting and Concert, where we sampled BBQ dishes from pit masters from across the country, and the drinks and jams were flowing. Then Sunday we attended Bloody’s, Blues, and Brunch at The Tiki Hut at The Beach House with @PigBeach_BBQ. This event was an oceanfront brunch combined with a seaside concert! The property team at The Beach House is so incredibly friendly, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and the location is stellar. The pool and Tiki Hut are undergoing renovations this winter, and I am so excited to see the new space next spring! #beachhousehhi #rocknribshhi #bloodysbluesandbrunch #beachhousepartner 
_____

#visithhi #lowcountrylife #coligny #discoversc

FINALLY made it to Karaoke Brunch at @KulturaCharleston (although I did not muster up the courage to sing - at least not this time 🎤😂) Kultura serves elevated Filipino dishes by Chef @Nikko_Cagalanan and Filipino-inspired pastries from @BaguetteMagic. The Guava Poptart and Ube Croissant were as delicious as they were ✨gorgeous✨ The Egg Sandwich was out of this world: scrambled egg topped with American cheese, pork belly adobo, banana ketchup aioli, house-made pickles, brioche bun. We also had the Baon Box with mushrooms, red onion, and carrot sisig over sticky rice with half a soft egg, topped with caviar. It was super light and was great to pair with the not-so-light Egg Sandwich! If you can get a table outside, do it. The patio is so cute and gives tropical paradise vibes 🌴🌿😎🥐🍳☕️

__________

#explorecharleston #chstoday #charleston #chseats #discoversc #eaterchs #brunch

📍 Charleston, SC
📧 charlestonfoodiebabe@gmail.com
